definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: A blindly ending branch of the alimentary canal or other organ.
sentences.chinese: 消化道或其他器官分支的盲端。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate clinical characteristic of alimentary tract hemorrhage caused by ancylostomiasis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鉤蟲感染導致消化道出血的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 33 cases of MPCDT were analysed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析33例消化道多原發癌的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: Distribution and ratio of enterococcus species among different animals were different.
sentences.chinese: 不同動物消化道腸球菌種的分佈不同，比例各異。

sentences.english: During the chronic phase, the parasites are hidden mainly in the heart and digestive muscle.
sentences.chinese: 在慢性期，寄生蟲主要隱藏在心臟和消化道的肌肉中。

sentences.english: To study application of anastomat and stapler in surgical reconstruction of digestive tract.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結消化道吻合器在消化道重建術中的應用體會。

sentences.english: To study application of anastomat and stapler in surgical reconstruction of digestive tract.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結消化道吻合器在消化道重建術中的應用體會。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of pantoprazole in the upper digestive tract profuse bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究泮托拉唑治療上消化道大量出血的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of electric radio-frequency under endoscope in treating gastrointestinal polypus.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察射頻治療消化道息肉的效果。

sentences.english: Metformin and acarbose more often cause diarrhea and other digestive problems than the others.
sentences.chinese: 二甲雙胍和阿卡波糖多引起腹瀉和其他消化道疾病。

sentences.english: Main side effects were digestive tract symptom and anti-estrogen effect.
sentences.chinese: 不良反應較少，主要爲消化道症狀及抗雌激素反應。

sentences.english: During the follow-up period, no aneurysms and upper digestive track bleeding recurred.
sentences.chinese: 隨訪期間無動脈瘤復發或上消化道出血，腹水消失。

sentences.english: The mortality rates of UGI bleeding in patients with hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) associated with portal hypertension were 63%.
sentences.chinese: 合併肝癌患者上消化道出血之死亡率則爲63%。

sentences.english: The frequency of hypomagnesemia in DDP group increased with the degree of alimentary duct toxities.
sentences.chinese: 實驗組低鎂發生率隨消化道反應程度增高而增加。

sentences.english: Cellulase activities of digestive tract chyme were increased significantly by exogenous enzyme, but also reduced significantly by fasting.
sentences.chinese: 外源酶可顯著增強雞消化道食糜的纖維素酶活性。

sentences.english: Upper gastrointestinal series confirmed a extrinsic compression of mass in the fundus of the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 上消化道造影證實在胃的底部有一個外來的壓迫物。

definition: esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
